column2: However,  the  examination of the  original  case  record  revealed  that
there is a subsequent nomination dated 24th  November 2011,  by which the

the  High  Court  of  Matara 
is  directed 
to  hear  and
this  case.  It is  clear  that  the  learned  High  Court Judge  who

column1: finally  delivered  the judgment was  empowered  by this nomination as  he

column2: was the incumbent High Court Judge of Matara at that time. Therefore, the

column1: submission made by Counsel for  the accused-appellants in relation to  the
2nd ground of appeal is based clearly on a misconceived notion.
